name: Solar System By Zach Mckenzie
description:
This is my solar system game.

The actual modifications I have made to the game (from the tutorial videos) are: 

1. The is a additional comet creator

2. The camera positions have been changed to fit the new solar system

3. I have changed the speeds of orbits of planets and added some planets with orbits.

This game was created by  Zachary McKenzie.
